text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Como el primer objetivo de Oguri Cap<n>es darse a
conocer y ganar más<n>popularidad, decidimos
participar en<n>muchas carreras diferentes.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Llegamos a un hipódromo que alberga<n>una carrera
de exhibición especial, cuando...

text_block_list.name: Yone
text_block_list.text: ¡Oye, Oguri! ¡Cuánto tiempo!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ¡¿Eh?! ¡¿Qué hacen ustedes aquí?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sigo la mirada de Oguri Cap y<n>encuentro un
grupo de personas<n>saludando y animando con
excitación.

text_block_list.name: Shige
text_block_list.text:
Jeje, ¡parece que te llevaste un<n>susto de
muerte! ¡Parece que nuestra<n>sorpresa fue un gran
éxito!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
¡No puedo creerlo! Pensé que había<n>regresado a mi
pueblo por error.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
¡Oh, perdón! Olvidé presentarte.<n>Estos son todos
gente de mi pueblo.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Déjame presentarte a todos. Este<n>es mi
entrenador, y...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Me presenta brevemente, y me<n>reciben muy
cálidamente. La gente del<n>pueblo de Oguri Cap
es tan amable como<n>siempre dice que son.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
You guys came all this way just to see<n>me? It's
such a long trip...

text_block_list.name: Take
text_block_list.text:
Come on! Our Oguri's finally made her<n>debut!
There's no way we could stay<n>home in the sticks
twiddling our thumbs!

text_block_list.name: Tome
text_block_list.text:
We all wanted to see you give it your all<n>in a
central race, so we came to cheer<n>you on!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Thank you all so much.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
As the people from her hometown take<n>turns
expressing their support, a smile<n>gradually
appears on Oguri Cap's face.<n>And then...

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, isn't that Oguri Cap over there? I<n>heard that
absolutely no one stood a<n>chance against her
back in Kasamatsu.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but that was Kasamatsu. TheTwinkle Series is in a whole otherleague.

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, who do you think's gonna be in<n>the next
race? I've got my hopes up for<n>Tamamo Cross!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Nah, it's gotta be Super Creek! I mean,<n>she's...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Well then, I've gotta go and get ready.

text_block_list.name: Shige
text_block_list.text:
A-all right... But hold on a minute,<n>Oguri. Are you
okay?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hm? Okay with what?

text_block_list.name: Tome
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're fine, that's all that<n>matters,
but...

text_block_list.name: Tome
text_block_list.text:
You're more than welcome to come<n>home if things
get too tough out here,<n>you hear me?

text_block_list.name: Take
text_block_list.text:
We'll always be your loudest supporters!<n>Make
sure to listen to us and no one<n>else, all right?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
U-uh, okay... Thank you? Today's just an<n>
exhibition race though, so I hope you<n>guys enjoy
it.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Once Oguri Cap's hometown friends<n>send us on
our way, I notice that she still<n>looks puzzled—as if
she doesn't<n>understand why they were so worried<n>
about her.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I explain that they probably heard some<n>
thoughtless comments coming from the<n>other
spectators.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh... So that's why they were worried<n>about me.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
People will think what they want, so I<n>just ignore
the negativity.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Hm... But I guess it's making everybody<n>else
uneasy.
choice_data_list:
If you win, there'll be nothing to worry about
anymore!

If you win, there'll be nothing to worry about
anymore!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
...That's true. Another reason for me<n>enter lots of
races.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I'll make sure everyone in this city<n>acknowledges
me—I promise.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But first, I have to win this race and let<n>everyone
know I'm doing okay.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
True to her word, Oguri Cap surges<n>ahead in the
homestretch and, in a<n>stunning victory, shows her
hometown<n>supporters the true measure of her
skill.
